meaningMnemonic: It's time to do the <radical>mouth</radical> <radical>sun</radical> <radical>sun</radical> <kanji>chant</kanji>. That's when you use your mouth to chant sun sun, sun sun, sun sun, over and over until the sun appears.
readingMnemonic: You're doing this <kanji>chant</kanji> because the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう) ordered you to. The sun hasn't been shining on him as much lately, and he's displeased. So now you have to chant for him.
